title: MolSSI Software Fellowship
description: "Prestigious fellowships that recognize advanced graduate students and postdocs pursuing the development of software infrastructure, middleware, and frameworks that will benefit the broader field of computational molecular sciences"

title: Rising Star in Computational and Data Sciences
description: I was honored to be selected to participate in this workshop, which unfortunately had to go virtual due to the pandemic, but was still a great experience!

title: MFI Postdoctoral Fellowship
description: "The MFI Postdoctoral Fellowship Program seeks candidates that will support the vision of MFI by demonstrating leadership in advanced manufacturing technologies, artificial intelligence, integrated design and entrepreneurship, the science of learning, technology policy, and addressing challenges that cross multiple disciplines."

title: Blue Waters Graduate Fellowship
description: Provides full stipend, tuition award, and computing resources for one year of graduate research support.

title: Second Place, de Florez Award Competition
GRFP Honorable Mention
description: Favorably reviewed application for the NSF Graduate Research Fellowship Program.

title: Gates Cambridge Scholarship
description: Fully-funded scholarship to the University of Cambridge, established by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation and awarded to students with "outstanding intellectual ability, leadership potential, and a commitment to improving the lives of others."

title: Howard L. Schultz Prize
description: Awarded to an undergraduate demonstrating "excellence, inventiveness, and good taste in experimental physics."

title: Mellon Grant
description: Competitive grant that partially funded my undergraduate senior thesis research.

title: REMRSEC REU Technical Achievement Award
granter: Colorado School of Mines Renewable Energy Materials Research Science and Engineering Center
description: For the work that "best exhibits outstanding science." I received it for my project on Raman Spectroscopy of Silicon Quantum Dots.

title: Intel STS Semifinalist
description: Research-based science competition for high school seniors, now known as the Regeneron Science Talent Search. I received semifinalist status for my work at the University of Rochester Laboratory for Laser Energetics in the summer of 2008
